entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
